articles.title: Hamas says ready for ceasefire but wants a complete end to the Gaza war
articles.description: Hamas has indicated its openness to a ceasefire agreement with Israel but insists that any deal must bring a complete end to the war in Gaza. This comes after U.S. President Donald Trump announced a U.S.-backed proposal for a 60-day ceasefire. [1, 14]

articles.title: US Senate passes Trump's landmark mega-bill
articles.description: The U.S. Senate has narrowly approved former President Trump's sweeping tax and spending legislation after a marathon 24-hour session. The bill, described as a 'big beautiful bill,' still needs to clear major hurdles in the House of Representatives before it can become law. [4, 5, 8, 11]

articles.title: Telangana pharma factory blast: One more body recovered from site, death toll rises to 37
articles.description: The death toll from the explosion at the Sigachi Industries blast site in Pashamylaram, Telangana, has risen to 37 after another body was recovered. The company has informed the National Stock Exchange (NSE) that 40 of its workers were killed in the incident. [1]
